SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.ui.proofeditorui.treeview

Class TreeElementView

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.ui.proofeditorui.treeview.TreeElementView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
TreeNodeView, TreeTransitionView
public abstract class TreeElementView extends Object implements Shape
Abstract base class for views of tree elements in the tree structure. This class implements the Shape interface to support custom drawing and interaction with tree elements. It holds properties for rendering, interaction, and layout of the tree elements.
